class_uid: Integer: Required: Must be 2005 for Incident Finding.
finding_uid: String: Required: Unique identifier of the finding.
title: String: Required: Title or brief phrase summarizing the incident finding.
desc: String: Optional: Description of the incident finding.
severity_id: Integer: Optional: Numeric severity level as defined by OCSF.
severity: String: Optional: Human readable severity name.
status_id: Integer: Optional: Numeric status of the finding (e.g., New, In Progress, Closed).
confidence: Integer: Optional: Confidence score (0â€“100) that the finding is valid.
created_time: Timestamp String: Optional: Time when the finding record was created.
first_seen_time: Timestamp String: Optional: Time when the incident activity was first observed.
last_seen_time: Timestamp String: Optional: Time when the incident activity was last observed.
modified_time: Timestamp String: Optional: Time when the finding was last modified.
types: Array of String: Optional: One or more OCSF incident or finding type classifications.

product.name: String: Optional: Name of the product that generated the finding.
product.uid: String: Optional: Unique identifier of the product.

related_events: Array of String: Optional: UIDs of related events.

remediation.desc: String: Optional: Description of how the incident was or should be remediated.

references: Array of String: Optional: URLs pointing to the source or supporting material for the finding.
supporting_data: String: Optional: Any additional context or evidence about the finding.

metadata.uid: String: Optional: Original finding UID from the source system.
metadata.activity_id: String: Optional: Rule, control, or activity that produced the finding.

custom_attributes.comments: Array: Optional: An array of JSON objects with fields 'author', 'timestamp', 'text'.
custom_attributes.tlp: Integer: Optional: Traffic Light Protocol classification. Default: 2.
